message.text: 非藏文的字体及其大小
You've reached the end of the document. Do you want to continue searching from the beginning?
你已经到达文本末尾，是否继续从头查找？
Consult your THDL documentation and install a supported media player.
请参考THDL文档并安装媒体播放器。
Are you sure you want to delete this speaker?
你确实要删除这位发言者吗？
转录文本 + 英文 +中文
Enter the URL of the media you want to open:
输入你要打开的媒体网址：
Do you want to save this transcript?
What do you want to do?
Changes to the interface will show up\nthe next time you open QuillDriver.
下一次打开QuillDriver\n时候显示界面将改变。
The number of open transcripts was exceed, please close one of them, and retry!
目前打开的文件数目超过,请关闭其中一个,再试!
You cannot open a transcript twice!
对不起,你不能打开一个与已打开的文件有相同文件名的文件!
Only transcription mode could use this function!
只有转录THDL文本模式才能使用此功能!
Automatically open this dialog box when QuillDriver starts up?
当启动QuillDriver时,是否自动打开此对话框?
Do you want to save the changes?
Plays the video if it is stopped; pauses it otherwise.
如果视频停止,播发它;否则停止它.

Rewinds the video by a specified decrement without stopping it. The decrement is determined by QuillDriver's "Play minus" value, which is one of QuillDriver's user preferences. For example, if the "Play minus" parameter value is 1,000 (one thousand milliseconds), then the video will rewind by one second while still playing.

Rewinds the video by a specified decrement without stopping it. The decrement is determined by QuillDriver's "Play minus" value, which is one of QuillDriver's user preferences. For example, if the "Play minus" value is 1,000 (one thousand milliseconds), then the video will rewind by one second while still playing.
Plays the next transcription line that has start and end time codes associated with it.
Plays the next transcription line that has start and end time codes associated with it.
Plays the currently selected transcription line.
Plays the currently selected transcription line.

Plays the end of the current transcription line. Again, how much constitutes the "end" of the line is determined by the "Play minus" value. If the "Play minus" value is 1,000, then this will play the final second of the current line. By using this function, you don't have to listen to the entirety of a transcription line when checking or editing its end time code.

Plays the end of the current transcription line. Again, how much constitutes the "end" of the line is determined by the "Play minus" value. If the "Play minus" value is 1,000, then this will play the final second of the current line. By using this function, you don't have to listen to the entirety of a transcription line when checking or editing its end time code.
播放前面的转录文本行.
Moves the editing cursor to the next transcription line, without playing it.
Moves the editing cursor to the next transcription line, without playing it.
Moves the editing cursor to the previous transcription line, without playing it.
Moves the editing cursor to the previous transcription line, without playing it.
Adds a new speaker slot to the metadata at the beginning of the transcript.
Adds a new speaker slot to the metadata at the beginning of the transcript.

If your cursor is located on a speaker name within the metadata at the beginning of the transcript, then this will delete that speaker from the metadata. CAUTION: This does not delete any references to the speaker within the transcript itself. If you have actually assigned transcription lines to this speaker, then you should first delete those transcription lines before deleting the speaker in the metadata.

If your cursor is located on a speaker name within the metadata at the beginning of the transcript, then this will delete that speaker from the metadata. CAUTION: This does not delete any references to the speaker within the transcript itself. If you have actually assigned transcription lines to this speaker, then you should first delete those transcription lines before deleting the speaker in the metadata.

Changes the speaker assigned to the current transcription line. This works by cycling through the speakers one by one. Thus, to change from the first speaker in the metadata to the fourth speaker, you must first change to the second and then to the third speaker. Using this function to change speakers is efficient only when there are a relatively small number of speakers.

Changes the speaker assigned to the current transcription line. This works by cycling through the speakers one by one. Thus, to change from the first speaker in the metadata to the fourth speaker, you must first change to the second and then to the third speaker. Using this function to change speakers is efficient only when there are a relatively small number of speakers.
Assigns the start time for the current transcription line to the current media time. Can be used if the media is playing or if it is paused.
Assigns the start time for the current transcription line to the current media time. Can be used if the media is playing or if it is paused.
Assigns the end time for the current transcription line to the current media time. Can be used if the media is playing or if it is paused.
Assigns the end time for the current transcription line to the current media time. Can be used if the media is playing or if it is paused.

Zaps away the start and end times for the current transcription line, by assigning both to -1, the "has no time code" value. This function is used to time code a line from scratch, in those cases, for example, where the existing time codes are completely inaccurate.

Zaps away the start and end times for the current transcription line, by assigning both to -1, the "has no time code" value. This function is used to time code a line from scratch, in those cases, for example, where the existing time codes are completely inaccurate.

Increases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Slow Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the start time by a small amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Increases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Slow Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the start time by a small amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Increases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the start time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Increases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the start time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Decreases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Slow Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the start time by a small amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Decreases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Slow Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the start time by a small amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Decreases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the start time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Decreases the start time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the start time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Increases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the end time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Increases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the end time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Increases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the end time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Increases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to increase the end time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.
Assigns the end time of the current transcription line to the end of the media. Use this when you want to redo the end time code for a line.
Assigns the end time of the current transcription line to the end of the media. Use this when you want to redo the end time code for a line.

Decreases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Slow Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the end time by a small amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Decreases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Slow Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the end time by a small amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Decreases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the end time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.

Decreases the end time of the current transcription line by the "Rapid Increase/Decrease" value. Use this function to decrease the end time by a large amount. This value is a QuillDriver user preference, so you can change it.
Deletes the currently selected transcription line.
Deletes the currently selected transcription line.
Inserts a new transcription line after the current transcription line. If this line has a different speaker from the previous line, then you must change the speaker for the line.
Inserts a new transcription line after the current transcription line. If this line has a different speaker from the previous line, then you must change the speaker for the line.
Inserts a new transcription line before the current transcription line.
Inserts a new transcription line before the current transcription line.
Inserts a english translation slot for the current transcription line.
Inserts a englilsh translation slot for the current transcription line.
Deletes the english translation for the current transcription line.
Deletes the english translation for the current transcription line.
Changes the current media time to the start time of the current transcription line.
Changes the current media time to the start time of the current transcription line.
Changes the current media time to the end time of the current transcription line.
Changes the current media time to the end time of the current transcription line.
Inserts a reference to the current media file into the transcript, so that when you next open this transcript, this video opens up, too.
Inserts a reference to the current media file into the transcript, so that when you next open this transcript, this video opens up, too.
Adds a general note to the current transcription line.
Adds a general note to the current transcription line.
Adds a lexical note to the current transcription line.
Adds a lexical note to the current transcription line.
Adds a grammatical note to the current transcription line.
Adds a grammatical note to the current transcription line.
Adds a pronunciation note to the current transcription line.
Adds a pronunciation note to the current transcription line.
Adds an interpretive note to the current transcription line.
Adds an interpretive note to the current transcription line.
Adds a sociolinguistic note to the current transcription line.
Adds a sociolinguistic note to the current transcription line.
Adds a cultural note to the current transcription line.
Adds a cultural note to the current transcription line.
Inserts a chinese translation slot for the current transcription.
Inserts a chinese translation slot for the current transcription.
Deletes a chinese translation slot for the current transcription.
Deletes a chinese translation slot for the current transcription.
The file/transcript could not be loaded! Please consult the log file for details.
The file/transcript could not be loaded! Please consult the log file for details.
The file/transcript could not be saved! Please consult the log file for details.
The file/transcript could not be saved! Please consult the log file for details.
